mapper.sql: id, goods_name, goods_type, goods_model, goods_info, goods_number, goods_surplus, goods_deposit, goods_dayprice, goods_weekprice, create_time, goods_grade, rent_count, reg_id
mapper.update:
update rent_goods
goods_name = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_type = #{goodsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_model = #{goodsModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_info = #{goodsInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_number = #{goodsNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
goods_surplus = #{goodsSurplus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
goods_deposit = #{goodsDeposit,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
goods_dayprice = #{goodsDayprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
goods_weekprice = #{goodsWeekprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
goods_grade = #{goodsGrade,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
rent_count = #{rentCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
reg_id = #{regId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update goods_picture
goods_picture = #{goodsPicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into goods_picture (id, goods_picture, goods_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsPicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into rent_goods (id, goods_name, goods_type, goods_model, goods_info, goods_number, goods_surplus, goods_deposit, goods_dayprice, goods_weekprice, create_time, goods_grade, rent_count, reg_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsSurplus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsDeposit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{goodsDayprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{goodsWeekprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{goodsGrade,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rentCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{regId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

select
distinct
from rent_goods
order by ${orderByClause}
